common.name: Finality Framework
oobe.jre_not_found: Finality Framework requires Java Runtime Environment (JRE) to run. Please install JRE and restart Finality Framework.
oobe.intro:
It looks like you are using Finality Framework for the first time.
This wizard page will help you to complete the configuration of Finality Framework. 
Select your Age of History 3 game folder path.
oobe.invaild_game_path_please_check: Invaild game folder,please check and retry.
